hero.subheader: Latest stories and conservation milestones from the Mabuwaya Foundation.

breakingNews.title: Breaking News
breakingNews.content: A lost species rediscovered? A critically endangered species returned to its wild home?

news.title: Rare Crocodile Spotted in Isabela
news.description: The critically endangered Philippine crocodile was sighted near a protected river zone.

news.title: Successful Nesting Season Reported
news.description: Over 15 eggs hatched successfully—hope for the Philippine crocodile’s future.

news.title: Community Training on Crocodile Safety
news.description: Residents were trained on peaceful co-existence with local crocodile populations.
